name: Commission on International and Trans-Regional Accreditation
description: CITA provides accreditation for international and American schools worldwide, ensuring they meet rigorous standards for academic excellence. CITA accreditation is particularly valuable for schools serving internationally mobile families and those seeking globally recognized credentials.
recognition: CITA is recognized internationally and is a member of the National Council for Private School Accreditation (NCPSA). Credits are accepted by colleges and universities worldwide.
